question:
Which of the following will contribute to fiscal consolidation?
  1. RBI increasing Repo rate
  2. Increase in Statutory liquidity ratio
  3. Start-up India
  4. Issuing government bonds and T-bills
Select the correct code from options given below:
explanation: Fiscal consolidation refers to steps taken by government to reduce the spending and check Fiscal deficit. RBI increasing Repo Rate This is correct because RBI increasing Repo rate will curb the commercial banks lending and contribute to fiscal consolidation. Increasing SLR This is correct because increase in SLR will again curb the commercial banks lending capacity and contribute to fiscal consolidation. Startup India This is incorrect because Start-up India programme is leading to fiscal stimulus in economy and this is opposite to what fiscal consolidation would mean to. Issue Issuing Government Bonds and T-Bills This is incorrect because government borrowing in bonds and T-bills will increase government\'s liability and hence no fiscal consolidation.
